price: 56. Mpe alobi: Nani azangaka elikya mpe ngolu ya Nkolo waye sé baye babunga nzela?
arabic: قَالَ وَمَن يَقۡنَطُ مِن رَّحۡمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla waman yaqnaṭu min raḥmati rabbihi illā al-ḍālūna
